channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Second
item.description: Ok. That’s interesting. I totally forgot about this blog. Today I suddenly found it. And I found my note about autoposting. I did a little investigation about how I made this autoposting mechanism. Well, i’m thought I was smarter :) It’s pretty easy, but there is one critical dependency - it based on MacOS automator. There is requirements. Static site generator. I used «Hugo». Any text editor at you like.

item.title: First
item.description: This is the first post. I make deploy mechanism from MacOS notes. I’ll write about it and make recursive post about how this post made. Later
